==== Joining the Team ====
* All new members should meet the requirements before applying for the team. (<nowiki>[[OpenSourceCollaboration/MembershipRequirements|Requirements]]</nowiki>)
* It is essential to be on the mailing list (<nowiki>[[OpenSourceCollaboration/Documentation/MailingList|Mailing List]]</nowiki>)
* Familiarize yourself with the team's documentation, tasks, and objectives (<nowiki>[[OpenSourceCollaboration/Documentation|Documentation]]</nowiki>)
* Attempt to tackle some bugs, or at least triage them, this shows willingness to contribute. (<nowiki>[[OpenSourceCollaboration/Documentation/Bugs|Bug Documentation]]</nowiki> & <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu-osc/|Bugs]]</nowiki>)
* Submit application on Launchpad (<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/%7Eopensource-collaboration/+join|Join]]</nowiki>)
